website_summaries.verdict: A lightweight pitcher with some extra features that work well.
pros: The lightweight design makes it easy to handle and convenient to store
It's entirely dishwasher safe and it also comes with specific features like a loose tea infuser and an additional ice-ball maker
cons: The featured ice tray is nothing fancy, and many users agree that the pitcher's plastic body and handle feel flimsy

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking! Skip this one!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this pitcher for 2 months and tried really hard to like it. I should have returned it immediately. The clear plastic is great. The fit the of screw in infuser and tea basket are terrible. It is impossible to get them to stay in place. The handle and lid seem great and comfortable at first. However the lid does not have a vent so pouring is very slow and it spirts liquid all over the counter no matter how slow and carful you try to be. I do not recommend this pitcher for anyone. Look for something else. Total waste of money.

customer_reviews.title: so you end up with the tubes floating around in your tea -- not really useful for loose teas
